type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.ForkOptions
type.description: Fork options for Java compilation. Only take effect if CompileOptions.fork is true.

method.name: getExecutable
method.description: Returns the compiler executable to be used. If set, a new compiler process will be forked for every compile task. Defaults to null.

method.name: getTempDir
method.description: Returns the directory used for temporary files that may be created to pass command line arguments to the compiler process. Defaults to null, in which case the directory will be chosen automatically.

method.name: setExecutable
method.description: Sets the compiler executable to be used. If set, a new compiler process will be forked for every compile task. Defaults to null.

method.name: setTempDir
method.description: Sets the directory used for temporary files that may be created to pass command line arguments to the compiler process. Defaults to null, in which case the directory will be chosen automatically.

property.name: executable
property.description: Returns the compiler executable to be used. If set, a new compiler process will be forked for every compile task. Defaults to null.

property.name: tempDir
property.description: Returns the directory used for temporary files that may be created to pass command line arguments to the compiler process. Defaults to null, in which case the directory will be chosen automatically.
